includedAssets.title: Spider-Man
includedAssets.synopsis: A spider bite transforms Tobey Maguire from school geek to crimefighting superhero. Webslinging smash with Willem Dafoe and Kirsten Dunst.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A spider bite transforms Tobey Maguire from school geek to crimefighting superhero. Webslinging smash with Willem Dafoe and Kirsten Dunst.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A spider bite transforms Tobey Maguire from school geek to crimefighting superhero. Webslinging smash with Willem Dafoe and Kirsten Dunst.

includedAssets.title: Spider-Man 2
includedAssets.synopsis: There's no rest for the arachnid as Tobey Maguire's Spider-Man tries to rid New York of Alfred Molina's eight-armed madman Doctor Octopus. To add to his problems, poor old Peter Parker is still having issues with his sweetheart Mary-Jane (Kirsten Dunst). Yet again, director Sam Raimi spins an inescapable web of eye-popping, Oscar-winning SFX, heart-stopping drama and superguy-meets-girl romance. Best sequel ever made? Forget about it. Best comic book movie ever made - that's closer to the mark.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tobey Maguire returns as the Webbed Wonder, battling evil in New York with Kirsten Dunst at his side. Action-packed superhero sequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: There's no rest for the arachnid as Tobey Maguire's Spider-Man tries to rid New York of Alfred Molina's eight-armed madman Doctor Octopus. To add to his problems, poor old Peter Parker is still having issues with his sweetheart Mary-Jane (Kirsten Dunst). Yet again, director Sam Raimi spins an inescapable web of eye-popping, Oscar-winning SFX, heart-stopping drama and superguy-meets-girl romance. Best sequel ever made? Forget about it. Best comic book movie ever made - that's closer to the mark.

includedAssets.title: Spider-Man 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Super-powered action as Spidey battles his inner demons while villains Sandman and Venom plot to take him down. Action with Tobey Maguire.

includedAssets.title: Spider-Man 1-3
includedAssets.synopsis: Awkward teenager Peter Parker develops incredible powers after a bite from a radioactive spider, becoming New York City's friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man. Tobey Maguire catches crooks just like flies as Marvel’s iconic wall-crawler. Box office smash-hit also starring James Franco, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, Alfred Molina and J.K. Simmons.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Tobey Maguire catches crooks just like flies as Marvel’s iconic Spider-Man. Also starring James Franco, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe and Alfred Molina.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Awkward teenager Peter Parker develops incredible powers after a bite from a radioactive spider, becoming New York City's friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man. Tobey Maguire catches crooks just like flies as Marvel’s iconic wall-crawler. Box office smash-hit also starring James Franco, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, Alfred Molina and J.K. Simmons.
